text: An anaphrodisiac is something that makes the one who uses it less aroused. This can be a medicine,Wesby, R., et al. "A survey of psychosexual arousability in male patients on depot neuroleptic medication." European psychiatry 11.2 (1996): 81-86. a food or a procedure.Emsley, John. "The Cambridge World History of Food." Science 290.5495 (2000): 1305-1305. It is sometimes used to treat hypersexuals.Zanoli, P., et al. "Experimental evidence of the anaphrodisiac activity of Humulus lupulus L. in na√Øve male rats." Journal of ethnopharmacology 125.1 (2009): 36-40. It is also used for an animal that is in heat.ABMAYR, H. "Experiments with" Equoman," a hormone preparation from pregnant mare's serum, in anaphrodisiac cows." Tierarztliche Umschau 5 (1950): 59-61. Pills that lower the libido are sometimes called antaphrodisiacs.Parray, Shabir Ahmad, et al. "Ruta graveolens: from traditional system of medicine to modern pharmacology: an overview." Am J Pharm Tech Res 2.2 (2012): 239-252. ==References== Category:Sexuality Category:Anaphrodisiacs
title: Anaphrodisiac
